content: After taking a bit of damage, Boar Bajie will eventually let out a huge roar, starting a very long and terrifying phase. He'll begin to transform into different beasts, which have their own attacks you'll need to adapt to.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Zhu Bajie (Second Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
After taking a bit of damage, Boar Bajie will eventually let out a huge roar, starting a very long and terrifying phase. He'll begin to transform into different beasts, which have their own attacks you'll need to adapt to.
